margin--y-none.title: No vertical margin
margin--y-none.description: Removes all margin from the top and bottom.

margin--y-xs.title: Tiny vertical margin
margin--y-xs.description: Adds a tiny amount of margin to the top and bottom.

margin--y-sm.title: Small vertical margin
margin--y-sm.description: Adds a small amount of margin to the top and bottom.

margin--y-md.title: Medium vertical margin
margin--y-md.description: Adds a medium amount of margin to the top and bottom.

margin--y-lg.title: Large vertical margin
margin--y-lg.description: Adds a large amount of margin to the top and bottom.

margin--y-xl.title: Extra-large vertical margin
margin--y-xl.description: Adds an extra-large amount of margin to the top and bottom.

margin--y-xxl.title: Double-extra-large vertical margin
margin--y-xxl.description: Adds a double-extra-large amount of margin to the top and bottom.
